PHRASE.LANG: Name
A bundle of 20 animated slogan T-shirts
Un pack de 20 T-shirts avec slogans animés
Ein Paket aus 20 T-Shirts mit animiertem Slogan
Un pacchetto di 20 magliette con slogan animati
Conjunto de 20 camisetas con eslóganes animados
A bundle of 20 animated slogan T-shirts

A bundle of 20 animated slogan T-shirts
Description

The bundle includes 20 T-shirts with the following slogans scrolling across an animated ticker: 1) “I'm with STUPID -->”. 2) “Winner Takes All”. 3) “Made in the U.S.A.”. 4) “Made in Great Britain”. 5) “Who's the DADDY?”. 6) “I'm not lucky, I'm good”. 7) “Live The Dream”. 8) “SLACKER”. 9) “Will swap wife for BEER!”. 10) “That's How I Roll!”. 11) “Born To Rock”. 12) “Texas Hold'em Poker”. 13) “Rehab is for quitters”. 14) “I'd rather be gaming...”. 15) “Too old to game, Too young to die...”. 16) “Who Dares Wins”. 17) “Addicted to Dance”. 18) “Buy Me Another Beer”. 19) “I'M KIND OF A BIG DEAL!". 20) “Come to the Dark Side” [#Legal]

Le pack inclut 20 T-shirts avec les slogans suivants défilant sur une bannière animée : 1) “I'm with STUPID -->”. 2) “Winner Takes All”. 3) “Made in the U.S.A.”. 4) “Made in Great Britain”. 5) “Who's the DADDY?”. 6) “I'm not lucky, I'm good”. 7) “Live The Dream”. 8) “SLACKER”. 9) “Will swap wife for BEER!”. 10) “That's How I Roll!”. 11) “Born To Rock”. 12) “Texas Hold'em Poker”. 13) “Rehab is for quitters”. 14) “I'd rather be gaming...”. 15) “Too old to game, Too young to die...”. 16) “Who Dares Wins”. 17) “Addicted to Dance”. 18) “Buy Me Another Beer”. 19) “I'M KIND OF A BIG DEAL!". 20) “Come to the Dark Side” [#Legal]
